sentences.en: El Salvador produces 100,000 tons of refined copper annually.
sentences.cn: 萨尔瓦多每年生产10万吨纯铜。

sentences.en: He has refined his taste and manners.
sentences.cn: 他已使自己的趣味爱好和举止仪态变得高雅完美.

sentences.en: His speech and manner are refined.
Much of the really nutritive material actually was refined out of food.
sentences.cn: 大部分真正有营养价值的物质实际上已从食物中提炼出来.

sentences.en: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
sentences.cn: 油经过提炼去除天然存在的杂质。

sentences.en: Oil must be refined before it can be used.
sentences.cn: 油一定要精炼后方可使用.

sentences.en: Refined sugars are absorbed into the bloodstream very quickly.
sentences.cn: 精制糖迅速吸收进血液中。

sentences.en: Sugar, oil and metals are refined before use.
sentences.cn: 糖, 油和金属在使用前须先提炼.

sentences.en: Surgical techniques are constantly being refined.
sentences.cn: 外科手术的技术不断得到完善。

sentences.en: The firm's top man refined on his management style.
sentences.cn: 公司总裁对管理作风作了精微的改进.

sentences.en: The sugared vinegar is refined from the sugarcane and pine.
sentences.cn: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的。

sentences.en: They had a very refined apparatus.
sentences.cn: 他们有一套非常精良的设备.

sentences.en: They refined crude oil into various petroleum products.
sentences.cn: 他们将原油提炼成各种石油产品.

sentences.en: They refined gold out of the ore.
sentences.cn: 他们从矿石中提炼出黄金.

sentences.en: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
sentences.cn: 这种技术变得越来越完善，越来越受人欢迎。

words.tran_cn: 精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯
[油气][化工][冶]精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的

phrases.tran_cn: 轻精炼产品；精制石油产品

trans.tran_cn: 精炼的，精制的，经过改良的，举止优雅的
trans.tran_en: a substance that is refined has been made pure by an industrial process

trans.tran_cn: 精炼( refine的过去式和过去分词)，精制，使纯净，使文雅高尚
